Features

Everything you need to
ship faster

Powerful features designed for modern teams to collaborate, track progress, and deliver results.

Task Management

Create, assign, and track tasks with priorities, deadlines, and subtasks.

Team Collaboration

Real-time updates, comments, and file sharing to keep everyone aligned.

Analytics & Insights

Track progress with detailed reports, charts, and performance metrics.

Time Tracking

Log time on tasks and projects with built-in timers and reports.

Calendar View

Visualize your schedule with an intuitive calendar interface.

Automation

Automate repetitive tasks and workflows to save time.
